summary: I’m a Veterinary Technician, with 25 years working within the veterinary industry with a proven track record of 15 years in management skills. My expertise includes effective communication with the ability to collaborate within small or large teams, ability to work and handle multiple projects under strict deadlines with a high level of accuracy, creating and implementing process and procedures.  I enjoy generating new ideas and devising feasible solutions to broadly relevant problems. My colleagues would describe me as a driven, resourceful individual who maintains a positive, proactive attitude when faced with adversity. Currently, I’m seeking opportunities that will allow me to develop and promote my experience. Specific fields of interest include human and veterinary companies. Have  both BSN and valid work visa for the EU.

school.name: Ross University School of Veterinary Medicine

profile_positions.title: Idexx laboratories Customer Support Consult III-Nordics

profile_positions.description:
As the overseer of all business operations and staff at a non-profit animal shelter, I efficiently managed various aspects of the organization. This included organizing and coordinating fundraising events, ensuring smooth functioning of veterinarian services, treatments, and medication procedures. I also established an effective inventory system for tracking incoming and outgoing donations.

To support grant reporting, I diligently generated and monitored program statistics. Additionally, I assisted in identifying and preparing grant proposals. My responsibilities also extended to providing exceptional client support, resolving conflicts, and addressing complaints for over 200 women.

As part of financial management, I formulated and maintained the yearly budget for the board of directors. To ensure the shelter's efficient functioning, I supervised and coordinated a volunteer program, managing up to 20 volunteers simultaneously. I played a crucial role in streamlining the shelter's operations by creating new standard operating procedures and a comprehensive training manual.

In the realm of personnel management, I undertook the recruitment and training of all new staff, while supervising both paid and non-staff members. Furthermore, I actively engaged with the community by speaking at various public relation events, educating and raising awareness about the shelter.

By fostering collaborations with other non-profit organizations, I expanded the shelter's network and community engagement. Additionally, I continuously sought to improve my skills and expertise by attending coaching and communication seminars.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
I had the privilege of working in the Internal Medicine department alongside board-certified veterinarians, where I played a vital role in assisting and training four new team members. To ensure a seamless workflow, I efficiently coordinated and executed daily appointments, providing exceptional customer service by handling a high volume of phone calls.

As part of my responsibilities, I took charge of maintaining, repairing, and devising troubleshooting solutions for equipment, contributing to the smooth functioning of the department. Additionally, I actively provided clients with educational materials to take home, empowering them with valuable knowledge about their pet's care.

Furthermore, I efficiently managed inventory control within the department, ensuring all necessary supplies were readily available. During my tenure, I underwent training in various essential areas, including CT and MRI operation, equipment maintenance, veterinary medicine, and laboratory sampling. This training enhanced my skillset and expertise, enabling me to make significant contributions to the team and the organization as a whole.
profile_positions.title: Internal Medicine Veterinary Technician

profile_positions.description:
Sole reponbilty overseeing the daily business operations of a prominent veterinary animal hospital, comprising 14 doctors and a team of 65 staff members, with an impressive annual revenue of 6 million dollars. As a key leader in the organization, I was responsible for various essential tasks that contributed to the hospital's success.

One of my significant accomplishments was leading the recruiting efforts for new staff members, ensuring that we had a skilled and dedicated team to provide excellent veterinary care. To facilitate the onboarding process and promote consistency, I created a comprehensive training manual for all incoming staff for every department. 

With a focus on delivering high-quality medical services, I controlled the daily schedule, ensuring that our patients received the best possible care. Delegating daily work assignments for up to 50 staff members, I fostered an efficient and collaborative work environment.

Recognizing the importance of exceptional customer service, I wrote standardized phone scripts and managed a 20-line phone room staffed by 5 team members dedicated to answering incoming calls promptly and professionally. I diligently tracked phone room staff.
profile_positions.title: Practice Manager
